location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 391: Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Bartle Edward Frere, Commissioner in Scinde [Sindh], Kurachee [Karachi]

mods.abstract: This letter from Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, addressed to Henry Bartle Edward Frere, Commissioner in Scinde [Sindh], Kurachee [Karachi], is a letter of introduction written for a horse dealer who has shipped thirty-eight horses to the market in Kurrachee. Kemball writes that it is at his own suggestion that this year the dealer is taking his horses to Kurrachee instead of Bombay.
